Test: public void testValidate_UnexpectedOption() { final Group option = buildApacheCommandGroup(); final WriteableCommandLine commandLine = commandLine(option, list()); commandLine.addOption(COMMAND_RESTART); commandLine.addOption(COMMAND_GRACEFUL); try { option.validate(commandLine); fail("Too many options"); } catch (OptionException uoe) { } }
